content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hungarian version of the training is available here:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":82497,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/13e0d1b4-66f5-43f4-85c3-70bfa1403fd3/Hungary - Hungarian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/13e0d1b4-66f5-43f4-85c3-70bfa1403fd3/Hungary - Hungarian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"fileName\":\"Hungary - Hungarian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"name\":\"Hungary - Hungarian - EPAM Employee Privacy Notice 2023.docx\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"13e0d1b4-66f5-43f4-85c3-70bfa1403fd3\",\"extension\":\"docx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"English version:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM Systems Fejlesztő Korlátolt Felelősségű Társaság, Registered seat: Hungary, 1083 Budapest, Bókay János u. 44-46, Court reg. number: Cg.01-09-692031, Tax number: 12548051-2-44, (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"EPAM\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\") recognizes our employees' right to privacy.  We are providing you with this Privacy Notice to explain our practices regarding the collection, use, and other processing of certain individually identifiable information about you (\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"personal data\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"). \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
